text: Happiness for Two (Stestí pro dva) is a 1940 Czechoslovak musical film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Jarmila Ksírová, Jindra Hermanová, Stanislav Neumann. ==References== ==External links== *Happiness for Two at the Internet Movie Database Category:1940 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak musical films Category:1940 musical films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak black- and-white films
title: Happiness for Two
